item.title: Kindle Paperwhite 5 Review
item.author: bebound@gmail.com (KK)
item.description: I bought a Kindle Paperwhite 1 in 2013, when I still in the university. I like it very much and I’ve read many programming books with it. It still works fine after 10 years, but I want to tries the new model with larger screen and faster fresh speed. So I bought a used Kindle Paperwhite 5 signature version for only 620 Yuan (about $90) recently. Here is my review.
